verses.verse: The <S%H1697>word<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> to <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> from the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> when <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H6667>Zedekiah<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> to him <S%H6583>Pashur<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4441>Melchiah,<s%> and <S%H6846>Zephaniah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4641>Maaseiah<s%> the <S%H3548>priest,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H1875>Inquire,<s%> I <S%H4994>pray<s%> you, of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> for us; for <S%H5019>Nebuchadrezzar<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%> makes <S%H3898>war<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> us; <S%H194>if<s%> so be that the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> will <S%H6213>deal<s%> with us according to <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H6381>wondrous<s%> works, that he may <S%H5927>go<s%> up from us.
Then <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> to them, <S%H3541>Thus<s%> shall you <S%H559>say<s%> to <S%H6667>Zedekiah:<s%>

<S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> <S%H2005>Behold,<s%> I will <S%H5437>turn<s%> <S%H5437>back<s%> the <S%H3627>weapons<s%> of <S%H4421>war<s%> that are in your <S%H3027>hands,<s%> with <S%H834>which<s%> you <S%H3898>fight<s%> against the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon,<s%> and against the <S%H3778>Chaldeans,<s%> which <S%H6696>besiege<s%> you <S%H2351>without<s%> the <S%H2346>walls,<s%> and I will <S%H622>assemble<s%> them <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H8432>middle<s%> of <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H5892>city.<s%>

And I <S%H589>myself<s%> will <S%H3898>fight<s%> against you with an <S%H5186>outstretched<s%> <S%H3027>hand<s%> and with a <S%H2389>strong<s%> <S%H2220>arm,<s%> even in <S%H639>anger,<s%> and in <S%H2534>fury,<s%> and in <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H7110>wrath.<s%>

And I will <S%H5221>smite<s%> the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H5892>city,<s%> both <S%H120>man<s%> and <S%H929>beast:<s%> they shall <S%H4191>die<s%> of a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H1698>pestilence.<s%>

And <S%H310>afterward,<s%> <S%H3651><s%> <S%H5002>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> I will <S%H5414>deliver<s%> <S%H6667>Zedekiah<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> and his <S%H5650>servants,<s%> and the <S%H5971>people,<s%> and such as are <S%H7604>left<s%> in <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H5892>city<s%> from the <S%H1698>pestilence,<s%> from the <S%H2719>sword,<s%> and from the <S%H7458>famine,<s%> into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H5019>Nebuchadrezzar<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon,<s%> and into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of their <S%H341>enemies,<s%> and into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of those that <S%H1245>seek<s%> their <S%H5315>life:<s%> and he shall <S%H5221>smite<s%> them with the <S%H6310>edge<s%> of the <S%H2719>sword;<s%> he shall not <S%H2347>spare<s%> them, <S%H3808>neither<s%> have <S%H2550>pity,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> have <S%H7355>mercy.<s%>

And to <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%> you shall <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> <S%H2005>Behold,<s%> I <S%H5414>set<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> you the <S%H1870>way<s%> of <S%H2416>life,<s%> and the <S%H1870>way<s%> of <S%H4194>death.<s%>

He that <S%H3427>stays<s%> in <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H5892>city<s%> shall <S%H4191>die<s%> by the <S%H2719>sword,<s%> and by the <S%H7458>famine,<s%> and by the <S%H1698>pestilence:<s%> but he that <S%H3318>goes<s%> out, and <S%H5307>falls<s%> to the <S%H3778>Chaldeans<s%> that <S%H6696>besiege<s%> you, he shall <S%H2421>live,<s%> and his <S%H5315>life<s%> shall be to him for a <S%H7998>prey.<s%>

For I have <S%H7760>set<s%> my <S%H6440>face<s%> against <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H5892>city<s%> for <S%H7451>evil,<s%> and not for <S%H2896>good,<s%> <S%H5002>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> it shall be <S%H5414>given<s%> into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon,<s%> and he shall <S%H8313>burn<s%> it with <S%H784>fire.<s%>
And touching the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> say, <S%H8085>Hear<s%> you the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%>

O <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H1732>David,<s%> <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> <S%H1777>Execute<s%> <S%H4941>judgment<s%> in the <S%H1242>morning,<s%> and <S%H5337>deliver<s%> him that is <S%H1497>spoiled<s%> out of the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H6231>oppressor,<s%> <S%H6435>lest<s%> my <S%H2534>fury<s%> <S%H3318>go<s%> out like <S%H784>fire,<s%> and <S%H1197>burn<s%> that <S%H369>none<s%> can <S%H3518>quench<s%> it, <S%H6440>because<s%> of the <S%H7455>evil<s%> of your <S%H4611>doings.<s%>

<S%H2005>Behold,<s%> I am <S%H413>against<s%> you, O <S%H3427>inhabitant<s%> of the <S%H6010>valley,<s%> and <S%H6697>rock<s%> of the <S%H4334>plain,<s%> <S%H5002>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> which <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H4310>Who<s%> shall <S%H5181>come<s%> <S%H5181>down<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> us? or <S%H4310>who<s%> shall <S%H935>enter<s%> into our <S%H4585>habitations?<s%>

But I will <S%H6485>punish<s%> you according to the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of your <S%H4611>doings,<s%> <S%H5002>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> and I will <S%H3341>kindle<s%> a <S%H784>fire<s%> in the <S%H3293>forest<s%> thereof, and it shall <S%H398>devour<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> things <S%H5439>round<s%> about it.
